title: The Gary Null Show
content:
The Anglo-American coup to topple Iran’s best hopes in a secular progressive nation Christopher de Bellaigue is British... <!--more--> journalist and author with expertise in Iranian and Indian Studies and Persian language.
He has lived worked in the Middle East and South Asia, writing for the Economist, Financial Times, the Independent in the UK and other publications.
He divides his time between London and Tehran.
Christopher has written several books.
His Rebel Land won the 2010 Orwell Award.
His most recent book is “Patriot of Persia: Muhammad Mossadegh and a Tragic Anglo-American Coup.”
